name: Garoa Hackerclub Chatbot
description: A Telegram chatbot made for Garoa Hackerclub

API_TOKEN.description: Telegram API token for the chatbot

TELEGRAM_WEBHOOK_PORT.description: The port to listen to. Takes precedence over the heroku defined one

TELEGRAM_WEBHOOK_BINDINGHOST.description: The host or IP to bind to. Defaults to 0.0.0.0

GAROA_API.description: Garoa's API URL, if it changes

MIN_VOTES.description: Minimum number of votes needed to ban someone. The default is 10
